title: Hiltl at Mythenquai Lakeside Resort
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Buffet, Salad bar, Take-out, European
description: Operates only in very warm weather - check ahead. Visitors to the Mythenquai Bathing Resort can eat at Hiltl, which offers healthy, cold and hot dishes from the buffet, salads and sandwiches to traditional sweets from its pastry shop. Younger guests can look forward to a child’s size bowl, which can be filled at one’s liking.
